title: My 5 must-have gadgets for off-grid adventures
description: Being in the wild doesn't mean I can't be civilized and have an office to get stuff done. These are my must-have gadgets when traveling off-grid.

title: My go-to camera setting for the smoothest phone videos. Just don't abuse it
description: Dialing up the frames is an easy way to get smooth-panning footage, but it may not always be in your best interest to do so.
